db

Class ActiveUserService

  • java.lang.Object
    • db.ActiveUserService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class ActiveUserService
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    This class is responsible for interacting with table containing active users in database. It it a singleton and is meant to be injected as a field i.e. private ActiveUserService as = ActiveUserService.getInstance();
    Author:
    Piotr Ko³odziejski

      • getInstance

        public static ActiveUserService getInstance()
        Implementation of the singleton pattern. Creates ActiveUserService object.
        Returns:
        instance of ActiveUserService

      • isUserActive

        public boolean isUserActive(java.lang.String sessionId)
                     throws GameIntegrityViolationException
        Checks if user with given session id exists in active users table in db.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - id of a websocket session
        Returns:
        true if user exists in ActiveUser table, false otherwise
        Throws:
        GameIntegrityViolationException - in case of inconsistency in database

      • addActiveUser

        public void addActiveUser(java.lang.String username,
                          java.lang.String chatSessionId)
                   throws GameIntegrityViolationException
        Saves active user in database.
        Parameters:
        username - User to be set as active
        chatSessionId - User's session id
        Throws:
        GameIntegrityViolationException - user does not exist or is not unique

      • removeActiveUser

        public void removeActiveUser(java.lang.String sessionId)
        Removes user with given session id from active users table in db.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - User's session id

      • produceScoreboardForActiveUsers

        public java.util.List<Score> produceScoreboardForActiveUsers()
        Produces scoreboard for given list or users.
        Returns:
        list of active users and their points

      • doesDrawingUserExist

        public boolean doesDrawingUserExist()
                             throws GameIntegrityViolationException
        Checks if there is a drawing user among active users in db.
        Returns:
        true is drawing user exists, false otherwise
        Throws:
        GameIntegrityViolationException - if there is more than one drawing user

      • hasWordBeenGuessed

        public boolean hasWordBeenGuessed(java.lang.String word)
                           throws GameIntegrityViolationException
        Compares given word to the current word to guess stored in a db.
        Parameters:
        word - to be compared with current word to guess
        Returns:
        true if words are equal after trim and to upper case, false otherwise
        Throws:
        GameIntegrityViolationException - when there is zero or more than one drawing user

      • getActiveDrawingUser

        public ActiveUser getActiveDrawingUser()
                                throws GameIntegrityViolationException
        Selects currently drawing user from db.
        Returns:
        active drawing user
        Throws:
        GameIntegrityViolationException - when there is zero or more than one drawing user

      • getActiveUsers

        public java.util.List<ActiveUser> getActiveUsers()
        Selects all the active users from db.
        Returns:
        all active users

      • addPointsToTheUser

        public void addPointsToTheUser(java.lang.String chatSessionId,
                               int points)
                        throws GameIntegrityViolationException
        Adds given number of points to the active user with given session id.
        Parameters:
        chatSessionId - user session id to which add points
        points - number of points to be added
        Throws:
        GameIntegrityViolationException - when user is inactive or there is more than one user with given session id

      • getRandomActiveUser

        public ActiveUser getRandomActiveUser()
        Selects random active user from db.
        Returns:
        random active user

      • unsetDrawingStateForAllAndUnsetWords

        public void unsetDrawingStateForAllAndUnsetWords()
        Reset drawing state for all to false. Also reset previous words to guess.

      • setDrawingUserAndNewWord

        public void setDrawingUserAndNewWord(ActiveUser user,
                                     java.lang.String word)
                              throws GameIntegrityViolationException
        At first it resets state of all active users to not drawing. It also resets all the words to null. After that this method sets new drawing user and new word to guess.
        Parameters:
        user - to be set as drawing
        word - new word to guess
        Throws:
        GameIntegrityViolationException - when either user is null or word is invalid

      • getActiveUserBySessionId

        public ActiveUser getActiveUserBySessionId(java.lang.String sessionId)
                                    throws GameIntegrityViolationException
        Selects active user by his session id from db.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - session id
        Returns:
        active user
        Throws:
        GameIntegrityViolationException - in case session id is null, empty or blank

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        On close of the object makes sure to close the db connection.
